content.rendered:
Directed by Parasuram.

Written by Parasuram.

Cast Lavanya Tripathi(Anu / Ananya) . Mohammad Ali(Shaad Shyam (as Ali)).Ananth. Tanikella Bharani(Anu’s would-be father in law). Randhir Gatla(Arun).Sandhya Janak.Jogi Naidu. Hamsa Nandini(Nandhini). Pragathi(Anu’s would-be mother in law). Ravi Prakash(Siva).Bhel Prasad. Prakash Raj(Krishna Mohan).Satyam Rajesh.Jogi Krishnam Raju. Rao Ramesh(Jagannatham).Josh Ravi.Prabhas Sreenu. Subbaraju(ACP). Sumalatha(Sirish’s mother). Sumithra((as Sumitra)) . (0)

Language Taleugu.

Producers Allu Aravind. Bantoo Khanna. Bunny Vasu.

Production Geetha Arts.
